statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE location='Main Building';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_type='Camera' AND quantity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory ORDER BY equipment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE location = 'Main Office' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory GROUP BY equipment_type;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, last_updated FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND location LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC, equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, brand, model FROM security_cameras ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT model, brand, price FROM security_cameras WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM security_cameras WHERE brand = 'Sony';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE type = 'temperature sensor';
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE brand = 'Sony';
SELECT camera_id, brand, price FROM security_cameras WHERE model LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE resolution IN ('1080p', '4K') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT brand, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM security_cameras GROUP BY brand HAVING AVG(price) > 500;
SELECT s.type, s.range, sc.brand, sc.model FROM sensors s JOIN security_cameras sc ON s.price <= sc.price ORDER BY s.range, sc.brand;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT brand, location FROM cameras WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT location, brand, resolution FROM cameras ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT location, type FROM sensors WHERE battery_life > 10;
SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE type='Fire' AND enabled=true;
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE brand = 'Canon';
SELECT location, brand FROM cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE battery_life > 50 AND location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, type FROM sensors JOIN cameras ON sensors.location = cameras.location;
SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE type = 'Motion' AND enabled = true ORDER BY alarm_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT brand, price FROM cameras ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT model, resolution FROM cameras WHERE brand='Canon';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE battery_level > 0.5;
SELECT location_id, status FROM alarms WHERE type='Fire' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT brand, model, resolution FROM cameras WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT brand, model, resolution FROM cameras ORDER BY brand ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors INNER JOIN locations ON sensors.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE sensors.status = 'active';
SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.type, locations.name AS location_name FROM sensors JOIN locations ON sensors.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY sensors.sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cameras;
SELECT id, brand, price FROM Sensors WHERE status='Active';
SELECT model, price FROM Cameras WHERE brand='Canon' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT brand, model, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE resolution LIKE '%MP%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE brand = 'Canon';
SELECT brand, model, price FROM Cameras ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, type, location FROM Sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Alarms WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY brand, type;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
